constraints.name: convexity
constraints.description: 输入的多边形必须是凸多边形

constraints.name: orientation
constraints.description: 多边形的顶点按逆时针顺序给出

constraints.name: intersection
constraints.description: 计算两个凸多边形在平移后的交集面积

constraints.name: expected_value
constraints.description: 计算在所有可能的平移向量下的期望交集面积

constraints.name: positive_area
constraints.description: 只考虑平移后有正交集面积的情况
